item.description:
Hello friends,

Important update: location has changed to Atlantic Beach Club!! Perro Salado apparently does not open for brunch til noon, which is too late. So... we are all set for reservation for 9 people under "Erinn" at 10:30 at Atlantic Beach Club.  Never a dull moment *)

Please join us for our monthly Sunday brunch to socialize and meet other members! About 30 minutes in, I'll have people go around and introduction themselves so we get to know each other.

In the interest of not overwhelming the restaurant, I have set a limit on how many people can attend, so please actually RSVP by Saturday afternoon if you're coming (and undo your RSVP if you can't make it so others can sign up), so I can call ahead and hopefully make reservations.  IMPORTANT - if fewer than 3 people have RSVP'd, I will cancel the brunch til next time, so please check Sunday morning to see if it's happening.

Being new in town myself, I find locations online, so if you have any personal experience with a location (parking situation, if it can accommodate groups, quality, etc, since alot of that is hard to guess online), I am open to suggestions for future brunches, and even changing this week's venue if feedback warrants it, lol.

I look forward to seeing you all there!

~Erinn
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Atlantic Beach Club! *)
